decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (01, 02, 03, 04, 06, 07, Planning Statement and Technical Note: Impact on Highways and Transport (ref: 70041319) Received: 14th December 2017, 08 Received: 18th December 2017, Agent email dated 11th January 2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the walls and glazing surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The extension hereby approved shall be used for purposes ancillary to the use of the building to which the extension would be adjoined and for no other purposes (including any other purpose in Class B of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 or any other provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).
description: Erection of a single storey extension to front comprising employee entrance and cycle shelter and installation of fire escape stairs to north-east corner of building
